# Birla Tyres Truck | Off-Road & Agricultural Tyres

Discover Birla Tyres â€“ robust truck & bus tyres, heavy-duty off-road solutions, and durable agricultural tyres designed for performance, traction & reliability.

## Product Overview

[Birla Tyres](https://birlatyre.com/): A comprehensive range of tyres designed for trucks and buses, emphasizing durability and performance in various conditions. The product line includes heavy-duty off-road tyres and agricultural tyres, ensuring reliability and traction for demanding applications.

## Additional Resources

[PDF] kkesoram - CSE-India (https://www.birlatyre.com/uploads/file/080319110420/compliant+report.pdf): This document provides insights into the Kesoram Industries, detailing their operations and contributions to the tyre manufacturing sector, including compliance and sustainability practices.

[PDF] Compliance Report - Kesoram Industries (https://www.birlatyre.com/uploads/file/060319113949/Compliance+report+Annexure+VI.pdf): A detailed compliance report that outlines Kesoram Industries' adherence to industry standards and regulations, highlighting their commitment to quality and safety in tyre production.
